mapper.select: select dmid,dmtitle,dmsfile,dmfile,dmurl,dmProgram,dmCategory,dmcontent,dmhits,previd,prevtitle,nextid, nexttitle from (select dmid,dmtitle,dmurl,dmcontent,dmhits,dmsfile,dmfile,dmProgram,dmCategory, lag(dmid,1,0)over(order by dmdate)as previd, lag(dmtitle,1,0)over(order by dmdate)as prevtitle, lead(dmid,1,0)over(order by dmdate)as nextid, lead(dmtitle,1,0)over(order by dmdate)as nexttitle from digitalMovie) where dmid=#{dmid}
select dmsfile from digitalMovie where dmid=#{dmid}
